footer.title: Vietnam's leading TOEIC test preparation platform helps you achieve your desired score.

banner.title: Introducing TOEIC Online Test
banner.subTitle: The leading TOEIC test preparation platform helps you improve your English skills and achieve high scores in the TOEIC test effectively.

about.title: About Us
about.subTitle: TOEIC Online Test is a specialized online learning platform that helps learners improve their English skills and best prepare for the TOEIC exam. With a team of experienced teachers and a diverse system of exercises, we are committed to providing the most effective learning experience.

items.title: Mission
items.subTitle: Providing a high-quality English learning platform, helping learners confidently conquer the TOEIC exam and use English effectively in learning and working environments.

items.title: Vision
items.subTitle: To become Vietnam's leading online learning platform for TOEIC test preparation, where all learners can access high-quality learning resources at reasonable costs.

items.title: Core Values
items.subTitle: Quality, Innovation, Responsibility and Commitment to bring the best learning experience to learners on their journey to conquer English.

items.title: Real Exam Questions
items.subTitle: The rich test bank is compiled closely following the actual TOEIC test structure, helping learners get familiar with the official test format.

items.title: Detailed Analysis
items.subTitle: The detailed results analysis system helps learners identify strengths and weaknesses and have a suitable study plan.

items.title: Personalization Roadmap
items.subTitle: Apply AI technology to create a separate learning path for each learner based on their level and personal goals.

items.title: Learn Anytime Anywhere
items.subTitle: Multi-device compatible platform, allowing learners to access and study flexibly anytime, anywhere.

feature.title: Outstanding Features
feature.subTitle: TOEIC Online Test provides all the necessary features to support effective TOEIC learning and test preparation.

items.title: Practice Test
items.subTitle: Diverse test bank with hundreds of test questions designed according to the standard format of the international TOEIC exam.

items.title: Diverse Learning Materials
items.subTitle: Rich learning materials with many types of exercises and necessary grammar and vocabulary knowledge for the TOEIC exam.

items.title: Reporting & Analysis
items.subTitle: The system tracks and analyzes detailed learning progress, helping learners grasp their strengths and weaknesses.

items.label: Present Simple
items.howToUse: Used for habits, routines, facts, and general truths

rules.label: Rules
items: Use base form for I/you/we/they (e.g., I play)

items.label: Present Continuous
items.howToUse: Used for actions happening now or around now

items.label: Present Perfect
items.howToUse: Used for past actions with a connection to the present

rules.label: Rules
items: Negative: subject + have/has + not + past participle

items.label: Present Perfect Continuous
items.howToUse: Used for ongoing actions that started in the past and continue to the present

rules.label: Rules
items: Negative: subject + have/has + not + been + verb-ing

items.label: Past Simple
items.howToUse: Used for completed actions in the past

rules.label: Rules
items: Irregular verbs: use past form (e.g., went, saw)

items.label: Past Continuous
items.howToUse: Used for actions that were in progress at a specific time in the past

items.label: Past Perfect
items.howToUse: Used for actions completed before another action in the past

rules.label: Rules
items: Negative: subject + had + not + past participle

items.label: Past Perfect Continuous
items.howToUse: Used for ongoing actions that were happening before another action in the past

rules.label: Rules
items: Negative: subject + had + not + been + verb-ing

items.label: Future Simple
items.howToUse: Used for future actions, predictions, promises, and spontaneous decisions

rules.label: Rules
items: Negative: subject + will + not + base form

items.label: Future Continuous
items.howToUse: Used for actions that will be in progress at a specific time in the future

rules.label: Rules
items: Negative: subject + will + not + be + verb-ing

items.label: Future Perfect
items.howToUse: Used for actions that will be completed before another action in the future

rules.label: Rules
items: Form: subject + will + have + past participle
Negative: subject + will + not + have + past participle
Question: Will + subject + have + past participle?

items.label: Future Perfect Continuous
items.howToUse: Used for ongoing actions that will continue up until a point in the future

rules.label: Rules
items: Form: subject + will + have + been + verb-ing
Negative: subject + will + not + have + been + verb-ing
Question: Will + subject + have + been + verb-ing?
